item.title: Workplan, tests, results
item.description: Copied over, from a .md file to .rmd Tests/ Results Create a new post, with a new author (me) -CHECK edit metadata: roll back create date 1 day -CHECK it works, if you tick the box to change slug, etc. (is how i screwed up last blog3) changed author attribution -CHECK -PORTED TO BLOG2 put w_avatar.png in the /themes/Mainroad/static/img folder (alongside default avatar.png) NB: it got copied (dupe) to /public/img/ folder, when i served the site changed config.
